alternativeNames: Auch wenn's nur einmal war, bereue ich es ...
Even If It Was Just Once, I Regret It
一度だけでも、後悔してます
author: Miyahara Miyako
description:
One day, a jobless Kozuka Chiyo is wallowing in self-pity and trying to escape from reality when her landlord bangs on her door – she's three months behind on rent.

Her landlord's solution?
"Please have sex with me."

Thus the two begin living together – a romance comedy that appears to start with sex.
